name: BeMean
0:
”Alexa, open be mean”
”Alexa, start be mean”
”Alexa, ask be mean for a burn”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: be mean
des:
Enjoy getting roasted by Alexa. She has taken plenty of abuse now it’s her turn to dish it out. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next burn. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
